help.title: Help & Support
help.feedbackAlert: Thank you for your interest! The feedback feature is coming soon.

howToUse.question: How to use the app?
howToUse.answer: Take a photo of your food or choose one from your gallery. Our AI will analyze the dish and show you calories and nutrients.

photoLimit.question: How many photos can I analyze?
photoLimit.answer: Free users can analyze up to 5 photos per day. Subscribers have unlimited access.

saveMeal.question: How do I save a meal?
saveMeal.answer: After analysis, tap "Save to Journal" to add the meal to your food diary.

editResults.question: Can I edit analysis results?
editResults.answer: Yes, you can tap on any ingredient to manually adjust its values.

aiAssistant.question: How does AI Assistant work?
aiAssistant.answer: AI Assistant provides personalized nutrition advice based on your profile and eating habits.

specialists.title: Talk to a real nutrition expert (coming soon)
specialists.shortDescription: Talk to a real nutrition expert (coming soon)
specialists.description: In the future, you'll be able to connect with certified nutritionists and dietitians for personalized advice and meal planning.

suggestedFood.title: Smart food suggestions
suggestedFood.subtitle: Here are simple ideas to better match your goal for the next few days.
suggestedFood.shortDescription: Get simple ideas of what to eat today
suggestedFood.description: Personalized food suggestions based on your goals, preferences, and nutritional needs.
suggestedFood.empty: We don't have suggestions right now. Try adding a few meals first.

insufficientData.title: Not Enough Data
insufficientData.message: Add a few more meals to get personalized recommendations

error.generic: We couldn't load suggestions. We'll show some basic ideas instead.

protein.title: Protein sources
protein.subtitle: You're slightly under your protein target. Try adding 1–2 of these options daily.

cottageCheese.title: Low-fat cottage cheese
cottageCheese.description: 200 g of cottage cheese for breakfast or dinner is a simple and budget-friendly way to boost protein.

chickenBreast.title: Chicken breast
chickenBreast.description: Baked or boiled chicken breast works well with any side — rice, buckwheat, or vegetables.

eggs.title: Eggs
eggs.description: 2–3 eggs for breakfast, omelet or boiled, give a quick portion of protein and keep you full longer.

fiber.title: Fiber and slow carbs
fiber.subtitle: A bit more fiber will help with satiety and digestion.

oats.title: Oatmeal
oats.description: Oatmeal with a little fruit or berries is a simple breakfast that gives long-lasting energy.

vegetables.title: Vegetable side dishes
vegetables.description: Add fresh or cooked vegetables to lunch and dinner — start with 100–150 g per meal.

diary.analyzingHint: This may take up to a minute

articles.title: Articles
articles.errorLoading: We couldn't load articles. Please try again.

analysis.title: Analysis Complete
analysis.analyzingSubtitle: This may take a few seconds
analysis.processingSubtitle: Identifying ingredients and matching nutrition data...
analysis.subtitle: AI is identifying ingredients and calories
analysis.fixMessage: AI will analyze this dish again more carefully to remove any discrepancies or errors.
analysis.fixSuccess: Analysis updated with more accurate results
analysis.fixError: Failed to fix analysis. Please try again.
analysis.reanalyzeError: Failed to recalculate analysis. Please try again.
analysis.autoSavedDescription: We saved this meal to your recent entries. You can open or edit it anytime.
analysis.errorMessage: We couldn't analyze your meal. Please try again.
analysis.timeoutMessage: The analysis is taking longer than expected. Please try again.
analysis.saveError: Failed to save meal. Please try again.
analysis.needsReviewMessage: We're not fully confident about this analysis. Please double-check and edit the values.

warning.suspiciousDescription: This analysis has data quality issues. Calories may not match macros, or energy density seems unusual. Please verify the results.

analysis.reanalyzeConfirmMessage: Re-analyze this dish from the original photo/text? Current edits will remain in history, but the new result may differ.
analysis.fixWithAiHint: Tap to ask AI to fix or improve this analysis

describeFood.label: Meal description
describeFood.placeholder: Example: Omelet from 3 eggs with cheese and tomatoes, 2 slices of toast with butter, a cup of cappuccino...

feedbackMessages.celebrate: Great job! This meal looks well balanced.

edit.title: Professional Title

chat.shareMealsConfirm: Share your meals from the last 7 days?

disclaimer.title: Important Notice
disclaimer.intro: Before starting a consultation with an expert, please read and accept the following terms:
disclaimer.point1: Information provided by experts is for general guidance only and should not replace professional medical advice.
disclaimer.point2: Always consult with your doctor before making significant changes to your diet or health regimen.
disclaimer.point3: Your conversations are private. Do not share sensitive personal information beyond what is necessary.
disclaimer.point4: If you experience a medical emergency, contact emergency services immediately.
disclaimer.accept: I have read and accept these terms

success.title: Report Submitted
success.message: Thank you for your report. We will review it shortly.

block.title: Block User
block.subtitle: Stop receiving messages
block.warning:
Blocking this user will:

• Stop all messages from them
• Hide your profile from them
• End any active conversations

You can unblock users anytime in settings.

success.title: User Blocked
success.message: You will no longer receive messages from this user.

dietPrograms.stopProgramConfirm: Are you sure you want to stop the program? Your progress will be saved.
dietPrograms.pauseProgramConfirm: Would you like to pause the diet? You can resume anytime.
dietPrograms.resumeProgramConfirm: Continue the diet from where you left off?

referral.step2: They sign up with your code
referral.step3: You both get 7 days PRO free!

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before using EatSense.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using EatSense, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use the application.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.content: EatSense provides tools for nutrition tracking, food analysis, and personalized nutrition recommendations using artificial intelligence.

registration.title: 3. Registration and Account
registration.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. You agree to immediately notify us of any unauthorized use of your account.

userContent.title: 4. User Content
userContent.content: You retain ownership of content you upload. By uploading content, you grant us a license to use it for providing services and improving the application.

prohibited.title: 5. Prohibited Uses
prohibited.content: You may not use the service for illegal purposes, to harm others, or to violate any laws or regulations.

intellectual.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content, features, and functionality of EatSense are owned by us and protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.

limitation.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: EatSense is provided 'as is' without warranties. We are not liable for any damages arising from use of the application.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the application after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact: legal@eatsense.ch

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: EatSense values your privacy. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information.

collection.title: 1. Information Collection
collection.content: We collect information you provide during registration and app use, including personal data, nutrition information, and food photos.

usage.title: 2. Information Usage
usage.content: Your information is used to provide personalized nutrition recommendations, food analysis, and to improve the application.

protection.title: 3. Data Protection
protection.content: We use modern encryption and secure data storage methods to protect your personal information.

sharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share anonymized data with partners to improve services.

changes.title: 5. Changes to this Policy
changes.content: We will notify you of significant changes to this privacy policy through the app or email before they take effect.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to remember preferences, measure performance, and improve the experience. You can control cookies in your device settings.

children.title: 7. Children's Privacy
children.content: EatSense is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect data from children. If we learn we have, we will delete it promptly.

rights.title: 8. Your Rights
rights.content: Depending on your region, you may have rights to access, update, delete, or restrict processing of your data. Contact us to exercise these rights.

choices.title: 9. Your Choices
choices.content: You can manage your privacy preferences in the app settings. You may request a copy or deletion of your data at any time.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.content: For privacy-related questions, please contact privacy@eatsense.ch
